Activity: Morning: Wake up, listen to some energizing music, and prepare for the last day of the week.
Arrive at the office, greet colleagues, and have a quick team meeting to discuss progress and plans for the day.
Address any feedback from @uiux-1 regarding the error message UI. Refine the design and implementation as needed.
Test the error message system thoroughly to ensure all types of errors are being handled correctly and displaying appropriate messages to the player.
Implement a system for reporting errors to the server for debugging and analysis.
Lunch time! Celebrate the end of the week with colleagues at a local restaurant or pub.
Refactor and optimize the code for the tutorial and error message systems.
Conduct a final playtest of the implemented UI elements and feedback systems.
Document the client-side architecture, UI implementation details, and feedback systems for future reference.
Commit and push all changes to the version control system. Participate in a team retrospective to discuss the week's accomplishments, challenges, and lessons learned.
End of the workday and the week. Relax, unwind, and enjoy the weekend!
